ch0298_00_zinnia/0101_0701_01_10:
Hello, hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Looks like you’re doing well today!
ch0298_00_zinnia/0101_0701_02_10:
Take your time and enjoy your adventure at
your own pace!
ch0298_00_zinnia/7101_0701_01_10:
It’s exciting to see people on Pasio with Pokémon
that you typically don’t see in Paldea!
ch0298_00_zinnia/7101_0701_02_10:
Oh, how thrilled I’d be to hear stories about the
super-rare Pokémon here!
ch0298_00_zinnia/7102_0701_01_10:
People and Pokémon can do so many amazing
things when they work together—and I don’t just
mean using sync moves.
ch0298_00_zinnia/7102_0701_02_10:
There’s Mega Evolution, Dynamaxing, Z-Moves...
and Terastallizing, too!
ch0298_00_zinnia/7102_0701_03_10:
Sadly, the use of those techniques isn’t my area of
expertise...
ch0298_00_zinnia/7102_0701_04_10:
If you want to know more about them, that’s what
battle studies classes are for!
ch0298_00_zinnia/7103_0701_01_10:
Some Pokémon undergo a phenomenon called a
form change, which changes their appearance.
ch0298_00_zinnia/7103_0701_02_10:
Now that I’m here on Pasio, I’m going to change
into my vacation form! Kidding, kidding...
ch0298_00_zinnia/7103_0701_03_10:
If I play around too much, Director Clavell will get
angry with me.
ch0298_00_zinnia/7104_0701_01_10:
In case you weren’t aware, I developed a Pokédex
app in Paldea for Rotom Phones.
ch0298_00_zinnia/7104_0701_02_10:
It looks like you can install all kinds of apps on
the Poryphone, too. Fascinating!
ch0298_00_zinnia/7104_0701_03_10:
Maybe I could send out a questionnaire to
everyone to see what kind of app they want.
ch0298_00_zinnia/7105_0701_01_10:
You really like Pokémon, don’t you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0298_00_zinnia/7105_0701_02_10:
I want people on Pasio to like Pokémon even
more than they already do...
ch0298_00_zinnia/7105_0701_03_10:
I would greatly appreciate it if you could help me
out with that!
ch0298_00_zinnia/1701_0701_01_10: Ah! Hello, hello! I wanted to give you this!
ch0298_00_zinnia/1701_0702_01_10:
Remember to always be well prepared before you
head out!
ch0298_00_zinnia/1701_0702_02_10:
Promise me that you and your Pokémon will
be careful, OK?
ch0298_00_zinnia/2501_0701_01_10: Pasio has a variety of different environments.
ch0298_00_zinnia/2501_0701_02_10:
It’s a lot of fun to think about how a Pokémon
would behave in a place like this.
ch0298_00_zinnia/2501_0702_01_10:
There are so many environments in Paldea, from
scorching deserts to snowy mountains!
ch0298_00_zinnia/2501_0702_02_10:
I hope someday you also get to enjoy the sights of
Paldea, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0298_00_zinnia/2511_0701_01_10:
I’m a biology teacher, but before that, I used to be
a researcher.
ch0298_00_zinnia/2511_0701_02_10:
That’s why I know a lot about Pokémon ecology.
Pokémon battling, on the other hand...
ch0298_00_zinnia/2511_0701_03_10:
Well, let’s just say my students are the real
teachers when it comes to that.
ch0298_00_zinnia/2511_0702_01_10:
I happen to be the homeroom teacher for some
students who’ve reached Champion Rank...
ch0298_00_zinnia/2511_0702_02_10:
I may be a teacher, but I’m still learning
every day.
ch0298_00_zinnia/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! Today I woke up to the sound of
Pokémon cries.
ch0298_00_zinnia/3003_0701_01_10:
Afternoons are the perfect time for walking with
your Pokémon. It’s so peaceful and calming!
ch0298_00_zinnia/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening! I see you’re up late. Do you need
a little break?
